meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Mike Lewis Julia Lent Scott Singer Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6614.

td.p: Mike Lewis, a systems engineer from Bloomington, Minnesota
Julia Lent, a government affairs director originally from Shippensburg, Pennsylvania
Scott Singer, an attorney from Boca Raton, Florida (whose 1-day cash winnings total $40,401)

tr.td: THE NEW YORK PUBLIC LIBRARY
TOWERS
NAME THAT TUNESMITH
(Alex: ...the writer of the song.)
TOYING WITH YOU
PRODUCE SOME SLANG
(Joe Biden: I'm Joe Biden, with clues about the office of the vice presidency and some of my predecessors.)

Julia

BOOKS BY THE NUMBER
